alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 1:52PM EST until November 17 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Garrett County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers will increase this evening, with localized moderate to heavy bursts of snow possible overnight. The steadiest snow is most likely between 10 PM and 5 AM. Visibility may be reduced to a half mile or less.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
